articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Wolnae Islet Defence Detachment
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Wolnae Islet Defence Detachment
						
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, inspected the Wolnae Islet Defence Detachment now being successfully face-lifted as required by the Songun era.
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Pak Jong Chon, Pak Thae Song, Hwang Pyong So and Ma Won Chun.
					
					 He first went round the construction site of the barracks.
					
					 Feasting his eyes on the nice looking barracks from close and far distances, he said that the buildings would look attractive and would be liked by soldiers if their outside walls are colorfully painted to match the environment.
					
					 After looking round the newly built command and office of the commander of the detachment, he dropped in at the education room and learned about its width and length and its accommodation capacity.
					
					 He called for building well the education room to suit the sentiments of soldiers and their requirements so that it may prove effective as a political and ideological education base.
					
					 He went round bedroom, wash-cum-bath room and other places one by one.
					
					 He noted that to newly build the islet for the detachment is an important work to provide good living conditions to the soldiers who spend their youth at a remote islet post and turn the outpost for defending the country into an impregnable fortress.
					
					 He took necessary measures to successfully complete the building of barracks of the detachment.
					
					 Then he looked round the district of dwelling houses.
					
					 Feasting his eyes on the dwelling houses standing in rows, he said that when the construction is completed, a dramatic change will take place in the detachment.
					
					 At the Wolnae Health House he looked round a bathroom, barber's room and beauty salon. He was pleased that the house was well designed and constructed and good finishing building materials were used for it.
					
					 He looked round a kindergarten and a school and gave instructions to build them well to suit children's minds and erect fences around the houses in such a way as to make them look nice and peculiar. 
					
					I am pleased to see lots of trees on the islet, he said, calling for planting more trees there to turn it into a woodland.
					
					 He mounted the observation post to learn in detail about the enemy's current situation. Going round fire positions, he gave precious instructions on always making thorough-going combat preparations as required by a modern warfare.
					
					 He expressed satisfaction over the fact that the detachment modernized the observation post and turned all fire positions into an impregnable fortress, thus making the islet an unsinkable battleship.
					
					 He had a photo taken with soldiers and military families of the detachment. He took the children on the islet post to his arms and showed warm loving care for them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Sea Fish Breeding Station
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Sea Fish Breeding Station
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA)-- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to Ryongyon Sea Fish Breeding Station. 
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Pak Jong Chon, Pak Thae Song, Hwang Pyong So and Ma Won Chun. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un first looked round the monument to the field guidance given by leader Kim Jong Il standing in the compound of the station.
					
					 He learned about how the station has implemented the instructions given by the leader, recalling that he gave an instruction on breeding in sea water sturgeon, etc. living in fresh water after acclimatizing them to it, having an insight into the fact that if some freshwater fishes live in sea, they look nice in color and become tastier.
					
					 At indoor pond No.1 he asked from where sturgeon fries the station gets and what is production cycle and quantity and to which units they are supplied.
					
					 It is the last instruction of Kim Jong Il to breed lots of tasty and nutritious sturgeon and send them to Okryu Restaurant, he said, urging the station to thoroughly implement Kim Jong Il's instruction.
					
					 Kim Jong Un looked at sea cucumber bred in outdoor fish pond of the station. 
					
					 He was satisfied to learn that the station cut down by half the production cycle as compared with other countries by studying and rounding off sea cucumber culture method of Korean style. 
					
					 After going round the station, he gave precious instructions which would serve as guidelines for improving and strengthening its business activities. 
					
					 To make people get real benefits is as important as building the breeding station into a modern one and registering successes in fish culture and research into fish breeding, he noted, underscoring the need to properly choose the units to be provided with fishes on the basis of calculation of the production, arrange well aquatic products supplying bases having restaurants and shops in Pyongyang and put their operation on a normal footing.
					
					 He noted that if the issue of fish food urgently needed for fish culture is to be solved and business activities are to prove profitable, it is necessary to mass-produce high quality fishes including sturgeon and export them to foreign markets.
					
					 He called for scrupulously organizing the work for successfully producing processed caviar recognized as high quality food worldwide, in particular, to get profits.

articles.title: Greetings to Captains Regent of San Marino
articles.content:
Greetings to Captains Regent of San Marino
						
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a congratulatory message to Antonella Mularoni and Denis Amici, captains regent of the Republic of San Marino, on its national day.
					 The message wished San Marino development and prosperity.

articles.title: Ex-NBA Star Dennis Rodman Here
articles.content:
Ex-NBA Star Dennis Rodman Here
						
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Ex-NBA star Dennis Rodman and his party arrived here Tuesday.

articles.title: Delegation of Nepali Literary Forum Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Nepali Literary Forum Here
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Nepali Literary Forum for the Study of Songun Politics headed by Chairman Sonkori Baroti arrived here Tuesday to attend the celebrations of the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.

articles.title: Ghanaian President Supports DPRK's Efforts for Creating Peaceful Environment
articles.content:
Ghanaian President Supports DPRK's Efforts for Creating Peaceful Environment
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- John Dramani Mahama, president of Ghana, expressed support for the DPRK government's efforts for creating peaceful environment to build an economic power.
					 When meeting DPRK Ambassador to his country Jong Yong Chol on August 27, the president said:
					
					 The Ghanaian people are always remembering the material aid and moral support rendered by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il to Ghanaian and other African countries in building new society.
					
					 Very rosy is the future of the Korean people as they are guided by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 I hope that Korea with great potential for development would be reunified by the Korean people themselves free from outsiders' interference.
					
					 It is the invariable stand of the Ghanaian government and people to expand and develop the relations of friendship and cooperation with the DPRK.
					
					 I will make positive efforts to develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries onto a new higher stage.

articles.title: Brazilians Visit War Museum
articles.content:
Brazilians Visit War Museum
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Ambassador Roberto Colin and staff members of the Brazilian embassy here visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum Tuesday on the occasion of 191st anniversary of the independence of Brazil.
					 They made a bow to the statue of President Kim Il Sung acknowledging the crowds in the square where a military parade was held in celebration of the war victory.
					
					 They presented bouquets before the sculpture "Victory," the monument to victory in war, and paid tribute to officers and men of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Being briefed on the exploits the President performed in leading the war to victory and the feats of the army and people of the DPRK who defeated the U.S. imperialists and defended the country, they went round several halls.

articles.title: Art Group of Trade Unions Gives Performance
articles.content:
Art Group of Trade Unions Gives Performance
						
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Art Group of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) gave a performance at the Central Hall of Workers Tuesday to celebrate the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Among the audience was Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the C.C., the GFTUK. Officials of the GFTUK and workers and union members in the city watched the performance.
					
					 Put on the stage were narrative and choruses "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" and "Song of the Proclamation of the People's Republic", light music "Pyongyang Is Best", mixed duo "Arirang of Prosperity" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 The performers sang high praises of President Kim Il Sung's feats in nation-building.
					
					 Male solo "When Singing of Songun", female trio "Road to the Front Covered by the General" and female sextet "Father Is on the Front" resounded forth, greatly exciting the audience. 
					
					 Male chorus "Along the Only Road Wished by the Leader", mixed chorus "Push Back Frontiers of the Latest Science", mixed duet "We Are a Worker Couple" and other numbers gave deep impressions to the audience as they reflected the spiritual world of the workers and members of the Generation Federation who are making total devotion to building a rich and powerful country under the leadership of the party.
					
					 In female chorus "Man to Whom We Entrust Our Destiny and Future", female solo and pangchang "Honor of Life" and other numbers the performers vividly represented the deep reverence for Marshal Kim Jong Un who is devoting himself to the happiness of the people, glorifying Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea.

articles.title: Pyongyang Musical Instruments Exhibition Held
articles.content:
Pyongyang Musical Instruments Exhibition Held
						
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- The 7th Pyongyang Musical Instruments Exhibition was held from August 29 to September 3. 
					 Displayed in the venue of the exhibition were more than 1 800 musical instruments of over 90 kinds produced and manufactured by musical instruments production units, factories and enterprises under commissions, ministries and national institutions, individual musical instruments makers, components and parts of instruments and jigs, tools and materials for manufacturing instruments.
					
					 Appreciated by visitors were national musical instruments of unique style and tone quality, etc. meeting aesthetic taste of Koreans and the requirements of the era, pianos, accordions and bayans of good quality, various kinds of stringed instruments, wind instruments and percussion instruments. 
					
					 Drawing their attention were domestic and foreign technical information related to the production of musical instruments, instruments displayed by overseas compatriots and foreigners and ancient national instruments. 
					
					 There were experience-sharing meeting, seminar and concert and other events during the exhibition.
					
					 The exhibition provided a good occasion of preserving and glorifying the leadership feats performed by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in the field of manufacturing musical instruments and widely introducing achievements and experience gained in the study and production of the country's musical instruments in recent years.
					
					 A closing ceremony was held at the Pyongyang International House of Culture Tuesday.

articles.title: Science and Technology Are Engine for Building Economic Power
articles.content:
Science and Technology Are Engine for Building Economic Power 
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- The State Science and Technology Commission of the DPRK dispatched members of the February 17 Shock Brigade of Scientists and Technicians to various fields of national economy. They are creditably playing their roles.
					 The shock brigade was formed by researchers, scientists and technicians of Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering, the Environmental Engineering Institute of the State Academy of Sciences and others. Its members solved a lot of scientific and technical problems at major factories and enterprises. 
					
					 The shock brigade members active at the Sunchon Area Youth Coal Mining Complex raised the coal mining rate 30 percent over that in the past by introducing new type efficient equipment and props suited to coal bed conditions of the anthracite mines of the country. 
					
					 They developed man-carrying cable car service as required by the actual conditions of coal pits. They also solved the issue arising in scientific weighing of coal. They, at the same time, made at least 20 research achievements, boosting the coal production. 
					
					 Shock brigade members active at Pyongyang Rubber Factory replenished and rounded off modern processes, developing various sizes of gear belts and groove belts for different fields and improving their quality. This opened a prospect for radically increasing the production. 
					
					 Pyongyang Trolley Bus Factory established a process for the production of new type trolley buses thanks to the painstaking inquiry made by shock brigade members dispatched to the field passenger service in Pyongyang. 
					
					 Signal successes were also reported by shock brigade members active in the fields of underground resource prospecting, public health, etc. 
					
					 The devoted efforts of the shock brigade members are giving strong spurs to the drive for building an economic power.

articles.title: 11th National Ssirum Contest Begins in DPRK
articles.content:
11th National Ssirum Contest Begins in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- The 11th Grand Bull Prize National Ssirum Contest began on Rungna Islet on Tuesday.
					 The contest, opened on the occasion of Harvest Moon Day (15th day of the eighth lunar month), a folk holiday, has drawn some 130 players selected from Pyongyang and provinces.
					
					 The contest will be held in league matches and tournament, divided into body-weight (individual and group events) and catch-weight category events.
					
					 In body-weight category events five players from each team will compete in a tournament. In the group events two from youth level and three from adult level will compete in league matches, divided into two groups. Those which placed first and second in each team will advance into semi-finals and finals.
					
					 In the catch-weight category events, one player will be selected from each team and they will be divided into two groups. Eight players who take the first to fourth places in the league matches will play a tournament until the final winner is confirmed.
					
					 Prior to the start of the contest, Vice-Premier and concurrently Minister of Agriculture Ri Chol Man, who is also chairman of the Ssirum Association of the DPRK, made a speech.
					
					 This was followed by a contest of body-weight category event (individual).
					
					 The contest will last till September 6.

articles.title: Women's Premier Soccer League Matches Go on
articles.content:
Women's Premier Soccer League Matches Go on
						
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Women's premier soccer league matches are going on at Kim Il Sung Stadium here, drawing attention of football fans and other people of different social standings.
					 The matches between the Wolmido and Mangyongbong teams and between the Amnokgang and Chongchongang teams took place on Tuesday. 
					
					 The Wolmido Team beat the Mangyongbong Team 1:0 and the Amnokgang Team defeated Chongchongang Team 2:0.
					
					 In the matches Monday the Myohyangsan Team trounced the Hwangryongsan Team 5:0 and the Kalmaegi and Ponghwasan teams drew 0:0.
					
					 The final games of the group league matches will be held on Wednesday.

articles.title: Earlier Settlement of Crimes of Japanese Imperialists Demanded
articles.content:
Earlier Settlement of Crimes of Japanese Imperialists Demanded
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea issued a statement on August 30 in denunciation of the puppet regime's passive attitude towards the crimes related to sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 The statement accused the authorities of taking passive attitude towards the crimes related sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army in the past, counting on the relations between south Korea and Japan. This clearly proves that the "government" has no will to settle the issue, the statement noted.
					
					 It demanded the present "government" take strong measures to get the apology and reparation for the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists at an earliest possible date.

articles.title: UFG Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
UFG Denounced in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy, the Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy and other civic and social organizations of south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on Aug. 30 to denounce the U.S. and the puppet "government" authorities for straining the situation on the Korean Peninsula. 
					 They accused the U.S. and south Korean authorities of chilling the hard-won atmosphere of reconciliation and cooperation on the peninsula and increasing the danger of war. 
					
					 They branded the UFG (Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises) as very dangerous and provocative war drills targeted against the north. 
					
					 They demanded the U.S. conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK and roll back all its scenarios for the north-targeted nuclear war drills in order to turn the situation on the peninsula to detente from tension and to dialogue from confrontation. 
					
					 They also urged the U.S. to stop beefing up aggressor forces and pull its forces from south Korea and completely dissolve the "UN Command." 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should bear in mind that it is the only way for them to give up sycophancy towards the U.S. and implement the three principles of national reunification for independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity, they warned.

articles.title: Anti-IS Action Staged in Pusan
articles.content:
Anti-IS Action Staged in Pusan 
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Representatives of civic and social organizations and citizens in Pusan area of south Korea held a meeting in Pusan on Aug. 30 to denounce the puppet Intelligence Service for cooking up a false case under the pretext of security. 
					 Speakers said at the meeting that the IS and prosecution's investigation into the case of rebellion attempted by the Unified Progressive Party was a sheer farce from A to Z. 
					
					 The IS staged a seizure and search operation against the Unified Progressive Party to get rid of its crisis, they said, and went on:
					
					 The present campaign of suppression means the revival of Park Chung-Hee "yusin". 
					
					 The suppression of the Unified Progressive Party is another "coloring" row aimed at stamping out progressive forces and dividing the opposition camp. 
					
					 They stressed the need to dissolve IS and achieve democratization. 
					
					 They declared they would carry on their actions till the IS case is settled.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Denounces Conservatives for Distorting History
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Denounces Conservatives for Distorting History 
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore carried an article on Aug. 30 in denunciation of the puppet conservatives' act of distorting history. 
					 The article said the Committee for Compiling National History on the same day opened to the public the decision of approving the history textbook for high schools to be used from 2014. 
					
					 According to it, textbooks written by figures of the Modern History Society, an organization of neo-conservatives, passed the examination. 
					
					 In the textbooks the conservatives beautified Syngman Rhee and Park Chung-Hee, known as traitorous flunkey and military fascist dictator, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The textbooks did not refer to the fact that the military dictatorial forces mobilized the troops to cruelly kill demonstrators during the May 18 Kwangju people's resistance. They did not deal with the Jeju April 3 Uprising that claimed lives of innocent civilians, either. 
					
					 The article expressed concern about the approval of the textbooks fraught with problems in the examination.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Human Rights Abuse Censured
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Human Rights Abuse Censured
						
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- A lawmaker from the Unified Progressive Party, an opposition party of south Korea, held a press conference at the "National Assembly"  on August 30  in protest against the puppet authorities' human rights abuse.
					 He held that the Intelligence Service did not hesitate to abuse human rights to fabricate a case of attempted rebellion against the above-said party.
					
					 The IS let the police force of two companies encircle the place where a woman lives alone and hurled at least 10 investigators into a search operation, clear evidence of human rights abuse, he charged.   It staged a two day-long seizure and search operation unprecedented in history but it is nothing but a retaliatory action aimed to bring the charge of attempted rebellion against the opposition force at any cost, he added.
					
					 He stated that the real culprit of the attempted rebellion is the IS which violated social democracy by interfering in the "presidential election."

articles.title: Military Drill for Nuclear Strike in S. Korea Denounced
articles.content:
Military Drill for Nuclear Strike in S. Korea Denounced 
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan made public a statement on Aug. 30 in denunciation of the nuclear strike drill staged by the U.S. by flying B-52H nuclear strategic bombers in the sky above south Korea.
					 The statement said that the U.S. imperialist aggressors flew two B-52H nuclear strategic bombers to the sky above south Korea from an air force base in the U.S. mainland to stage a nuclear attack drill targeting the DPRK before their deployment on Guam on August 27.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The U.S. introduction of the nuclear strategic bombers, one of three nuclear strategic strike means, timed to coincide with the massive Ulji Freedom Guardian which it staged together with the puppet south Korean warmongers with the involvement of huge troops, is an unpardonable grave provocation to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost. 
					
					 The United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan bitterly denounces these moves and strongly demands they stop at once the moves to ignite a nuclear war.

articles.title: Memorial Service for Victims to Massacre of Koreans during Great Kanto Quake Held
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Victims to Massacre of Koreans during Great Kanto Quake Held
 Tokyo, September 2 (KNS-KCNA) -- There was a memorial service of Korean compatriots in Tokyo to mark the 90th anniversary of massacre of Koreans during the great Kanto quake. This was held before the monument to the memory of Korean victims at the time of great Kanto quake in Tokyo on Sunday.
					 Present there were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Hwang Myong, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters and other leading officials of organizations and enterprises of Chongryon, Chongryon officials and Korean compatriots in Kanto area. The representative of Tokyo Ward Assemblymen's Liaison Society for the Promotion of Japan-Korea Friendship and other Japanese attended.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the victims.
					
					 Hwang Myong made a memorial address.
					
					 He said in September 1923 when a disastrous earthquake hit Kanto, the then Japanese government declared the emergency martial law and put the army, police and other forces in motion to commit the state-sponsored crime of massacring Koreans. He expressed deep condolences to the compatriots who met grievous deaths due to the atrocities committed by the Japanese.
					
					 Decades have passed since then but the Japanese authorities have not yet opted for probing the truth, to say nothing of making apology and reparation for the crime. They are concealing and shunning the historical fact of the massacre of Koreans and are antagonizing the DPRK and Chongryon, persistently committing suppression and human rights abuses.
					
					 This year in which falls the 65th anniversary of the DPRK, the Koreans in Japan will spur the endeavors to defend the national rights and the happy future of Koreans in Japan, looking up to the motherland led by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He vowed to continue to strive to urge Japan to abolish at an early date the inglorious past with the DPRK, normalize the bilateral relations and build friendship with the broad range of Japanese in the spirit of the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration, rallied close around the Marshal, true to the last instructions of the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Messages sent from regional committees including the North Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration was read out at the service.
					
					 There were speeches.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report Posted on Website of Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report Posted on Website of Nigerian Organization
						
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- The full text of the report made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un at the March, 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea was posted on the website of the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on August 27.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Talk Posted on Website of International Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Talk Posted on Website of International Body
						
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's talk "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was posted on the website of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain on August 26. He gave the talk to Rodong Sinmun, organ of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Joson Inmingun, organ of the Korean People's Army, on August 25, Juche 102 (2013), the Day of Songun.
					 The talk deals with the Songun revolutionary feats of leader Kim Jong Il and clarifies the essence and originality of the idea of the Songun revolution and the tasks to be carried out to successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Songun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Talk Supported by Peruvian Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Talk Supported by Peruvian Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union and the Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea made public a joint statement on August 28 in support of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's talk "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution". He gave the talk to Rodong Sinmun, organ of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Joson Inmingun, organ of the Korean People's Army, on the occasion of the Day of Songun.
					 In the talk Kim Jong Un clarified once again his firm will and determination to invariably carry forward the Juche idea, Songun idea, Songun politics and Songun leadership, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The Songun idea is a brilliant embodiment of the Juche idea and the great revolutionary idea in the present era as it expounds that the Songun politics serves as the most effective policy, basic political mode under socialism.
					
					 The Songun idea is a revolutionary idea full of the transparent stand of independence against imperialism and noble patriotism.
					
					 The Songun politics serves as an ever-victorious treasured sword reliably guaranteeing the sovereignty and dignity of the country and nation and global peace and security.
					
					 Under the outstanding Songun leadership of Kim Jong Un the Workers' Party and people of Korea will successfully perform their mission and duty as defender of socialism, independence and peace in the future, too, and win a brilliant victory in building an economic power, accomplishing the cause of national reunification and achieving global peace.

articles.title: British Organizations Hail Kim Jong Un's Talk
articles.content:
British Organizations Hail Kim Jong Un's Talk
						
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on August 26 in support of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's talk "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution". He gave the talk to Rodong Sinmun, organ of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Joson Inmingun, organ of the Korean People's Army, on the occasion of the Day of Songun.
					 The statement said that the talk clearly indicates the way of the Korean people dynamically advancing along the road of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					 The talk amounts to a declaration that the DPRK will never withdraw from the road chosen by itself but will hold fast to the Songun idea forever. It also serves as important guidelines which would help the country dynamically advance along the road of the Songun revolution, the statement noted.
					
					 It called upon the Songun idea followers in the world to deeply study and widely disseminate the talk.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats in Nation-building Praised by Nepalese
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats in Nation-building Praised by Nepalese
						
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Manju Ratna Sakya, chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics, issued a statement on August 28 on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung was a defender of freedom, democracy and socialism and the founder of the great Juche idea.
					
					 He was the founder of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK and an outstanding leader of the world revolutionary people. He was a distinguished thinker and theoretician and a tender-hearted father of people.
					
					 His was the career of a great revolutionary as he dedicated his all to the sacred cause for the people's freedom and emancipation.
					
					 He was a genius of the revolution enjoying boundless reverence from all people.
					
					 The President, the great sage, embraced all those who devoted themselves to the country and loved the people, and helped them lead an eternal life.
					
					 Recalling with deep emotion the time when he had an audience of Kim Il Sung during his visit to the DPRK, the chairman went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung was the great leader of not only the Korean people but Nepalese and other world progressives.
					
					 The DPRK made great development under his wise leadership.
					
					 The exploits he performed by founding and developing the DPRK will shine long in history.
					
					 He expressed the belief that all the Korean people greeting the 65th anniversary of the DPRK would achieve great successes in all fields under the foresighted and energetic guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Songun Marked by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Day of Songun Marked by Foreign Media
						
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Foreign media carried special write-ups in the period between August 23 and 26 to mark the 53rd anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership (the Day of Songun).
					 Televising scenes documenting the revolutionary activities of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, the TVONE broadcasting service of Indonesia noted:
					
					 August 25 is the day when Kim Jong Il, the eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, started his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 He inspected Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on this day in 1960.
					
					 The Korean people significantly celebrate this day every year.
					
					 Thanks to his Songun politics, the Korean people could defend the dignity of the country and nation despite the West's sanctions and pressure on the DPRK.
					
					 On the occasion of the anniversary, Marshal Kim Jong Un gave a talk "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" to Rodong Sinmun, organ of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Joson Inmingun, organ of the KPA.
					
					 He, in the talk, called for thoroughly implementing the line on attaching importance to the arms and military affairs to bolster up the defence capabilities of the country in every way, opening up a new phase for the country's reunification and making strenuous efforts to check aggression and war and protect global peace and security.
					
					 The Guinean domestic, international and 7 national languages broadcasting services introduced in detail the exploits of Kim Jong Il under the title "Undying Songun exploits of leader Kim Jong Il".
					
					 His Songun leadership is being successfully carried forward by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, they stressed.
					
					 The Myanmar paper The New Age carried an article lauding the exploits of Kim Jong Il illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad de defensa de isla Jangjae y la otra heroina de isla Mu
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad de defensa de isla Jangjae y la otra heroina de isla Mu
						
Pyongyang, 3 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la unidad de defensa de la isla Jangjae y la otra heroina de la isla Mu, acondicionadas magnificamente conforme a la demanda de la era del Songun.
					Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Pak Jong Chon, Pak Thae Song, Hwang Pyong So y Ma Won Chun.
					
					Primero, el Mariscal visito la unidad de defensa de la isla Jangjae.
					
					Recorriendo el cuartel, las viviendas y la trinchera, nuevamente construidos, se entero en detalles del estado de edificacion y fortificacion de la unidad.
					
					Tras recorrer el cuartel, el bano publico, el comedor y otros, se mostro muy satisfecho al recibir el parte de que los soldados de la isla estan muy alegres por pasar el servicio militar en el cuartel mejor que sus hogares y en las condiciones muy comodas y que tambien los militares de la tierra les envidian.
					
					Evaluo altamente que hayan acondicionado bien la sala de educacion, sede de educacion politica e ideologica, conforme al sentimiento de los militares y elaborado perfectamente otros utensilios.
					
					Paso por las viviendas de las familias de los militares.
					
					Mirando area de viviendas levantadas regularmente, dijo que parecen casas de reposo.
					
					Tomo fotografias junto con cada familia tomando como fondo nuevas viviendas a ser distribuidas a ellas mismas.
					
					Aqui, no puedo encontrar la figura antigua del cuartel y area de viviendas, senalo y agrego que surgieron los nuevos puestos y nuevo paraiso isleno.
					
					Aprecio que los constructores hayan edificado muy bien el cuartel y las viviendas con el sentimiento de construir sus propias viviendas, recalco que la unidad de defensa de la isla Jangjae se convirtio en el ejemplo de la fortaleza deseada por el partido y apunto que el proposito del partido es construir asi todos los cuarteles y viviendas de las familias de uniformados.
					
					Ordeno que escojan los arboles y plantas que cubran la tierra, convenientes al clima y condiciones naturales de la isla para convertirla en el bosque bien poblado.
					
					El Mariscal subio al puesto de vigilancia, donde escucho el parte detallado sobre los objetos de la unidad de defensa ubicada en la isla Yonphyong y ultimos movimientos de los enemigos.
					
					Se puso satisfecho de que ese puesto y las trincheras se hayan convertido en la fortaleza inconquistable y presento las tareas y remedios para intensificar los preparativos de combate y la combatividad de la unidad de defensa.
					
					Se fotografio junto con los militares de la unidad y las familias de estos.
					
					Acto seguido, el Mariscal estuvo en la unidad heroina de defensa de la isla Mu.
					
					Recorrio el cuartel, las viviendas y las trincheras, nuevamente construidos semejantes a la unidad de defensa de la isla Jangjae, se cercioro detalladamente del estado de construccion y fortificacion.
					
					Al enterarse del uso de generador eolico, destaco la necesidad de hacer bien su operacion.
					
					Hay que sembrar muchos arboles resistentes a las brisas del mar para que el cuartel y el recinto de viviendas esten rodeados por arboles frondosos.
					
					Visito el Jardin de la Infancia de Mudo, construido para seis ninos y la Escuela Filial de Mudo para 4 alumnos, adscrita a la Escuela Secundaria Superior de Sunwi.
					
					Dijo que le agrada la remodelacion de la isla y dio agradecimiento del Comandante Supremo del EPC a las unidades que contribuyeron activamente a la construccion.
					
					Recorriendo el puesto de vigilancia y las trincheras de fuego, presento las tareas para preparar el combate e intensificar la combatividad de la unidad.
					
					Ese dia, el Mariscal presencio la funcion artistica ofrecida por los militares de la unidad heroina de defensa y les felicito exitos de su funcion.
					
					Tomo fotografia de recuerdo junto con los militares de la citada unidad y las familias de estos.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Fabrica de Piedras Aeguk
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Fabrica de Piedras Aeguk
						
Pyongyang, 3 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Fabrica de Piedras Aeguk.
					Le acompanaron Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam, Pak Jong Chon, Pak Thae Song, Hwang Pyong So y Ma Won Chun.
					
					Recorriendo varios puntos de la fabrica, el Mariscal se entero en detalles de la produccion de materiales de piedra y la administracion de la fabrica.
					
					En la sala del historial, recordo con emocion la visita anterior que hizo junto con el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					En el pasado, la fabrica contribuyo mucho a la construccion de las creaciones monumentales de la era del Songun al producir en grandes cantidades finos materiales de piedra de varios tipos, dijo valorando altamente la abnegacion patriotica y los meritos laborales de los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica.
					
					En su recorrido por varios talleres de elaboracion, se cercioro del estado de procesamiento de piedras, el funcionamiento de los equipos y sus especificaciones tecnicas.
					
					Muy satisfecho del funcionamiento pleno de todos los equipos, evaluo la alta calidad de diversos materiales de piedra hechos en la fabrica.
					
					Aqui me siento muy animado, dijo y agrego que el ruido de pleno funcionamiento de esta fabrica le hace mas firme la decision de abrir la era de gran auge en la construccion por la prosperidad del pais y la felicidad del pueblo.
					
					Paso revista con mucha atencion a diferentes muestras de materiales de piedra y las piedras elaboradas, colocados en la exhibicion de piedras Aeguk en el recinto de la fabrica.
					
					Ante la piedra con colorido semejante a la piel de tigre, la califico de imponente y original y al tocar la piedra serpentina lujosa, la evaluo de vistosa.
					
					Viendo los productos artesanales y utensilios hechos con piedra, apunto que se puede elaborar cualquier cosa con las piedras naturales al igual que con la madera.
					
					Esta exhibicion es un palacio de piedras, dijo y califico la fabrica de tesoro.
					
					Senalo que la fabrica ocupa una posicion muy importante en desarrollar la industria de materiales de construccion del pais y elevar el porcentaje de uso de estos materiales de fabricacion domestica.
					
					Los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica deben contribuir con piedras a la empresa de construccion de Estado prospero y apoyar con piedras al partido, asevero y presento las tareas que incumben a la fabrica.
					
					Subrayo que la mision mas importante de ella es producir mucho mas materiales de piedra necesarios a la construccion majestuosa y elegante de las creaciones arquitectonicas de eterna duracion.
					
					Instruyo tomar medidas consecuentes para proteger la salud de los obreros desde la contaminacion acustica.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia regalos a la unidad a la que pertenece Pak Yong Ung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia regalos a la unidad a la que pertenece Pak Yong Ung
						
Pyongyang, 3 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, envio a la unidad del EPC a la que pertenece Pak Yong Ung modernos barcos pesqueros, detector de bandadas de peces e instrumentos de pesca.
					El visito en varias ocasiones la unidad para averiguar el estado de captura de peces y los envio esta vez para suministrar a los militares gran cantidad de pescados.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 2 el acto de entrega de regalos.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a regentes de San Marino
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a regentes de San Marino
Pyongyang, 3 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, remitio la vispera un mensaje de felicitacion a Antonella Mularoni y Denis Amici, regentes de San Marino,  con motivo del dia nacional de ese pais.
					En su misiva, el remitente formula votos por el desarrollo y prosperidad de San Marino.
